          <title>
            <string language="en">Renewable energy resource - solar energy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfsmittel der auswechselbaren Energie -

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource énergétique renouvelable - énergie

            <string language="en">This illustration shows a house that runs on solar energy using a solar panel.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une maison qui
